Sid Meier's Civilization: Gra Planszowa
item.originalname: Sid Meier's Civilization: The Board Game
item.comment: Base game is a solid 8/10 for me. Byt when you add both expansions to it... wow. Love the tech tree, love modular board, love city building. The onlhy problem I had was not very interesting combat, with units that were obviously weaker and obviously better, but Wisdom and Warfare fixed that. Absolutely my favourite 4X game on the market.
